description: Try our easy to follow Zesty Barbecued Lamb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Mushroom,BBQ,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Zesty Barbecued Lamb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.1kg Woolworths Australian Lamb Leg Butterflied with garlic & herb, butterflied, with garlic & herbs, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat BBQ on high. Reduce heat to mediumhigh and cook lamb, skin-side down, for 10 minutes. Turn and cook for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low and cover with barbecue hood or foil. Continue to cook for a further 15 minutes for medium or until cooked to your liking. Remove from heat. Cover loosely with foil and rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
Meanwhile, spray mushrooms with oil and season. Place onto barbecue plate, stemside up, and cook for 2 minutes. Turn and cook for 2 minutes or until tender.
Season tomato with salt and pepper. Arrange rocket leaves onto serving plates. Top with tomato and avocado. Drizzle over balsamic vinegar. Finish with lamb and mushroom. Serve.
